topic.title: Internet Information Services IIS 10.0
topic.shortdesc: New features provided by the IIS 10.0 web server in Windows Server 2016 include:

li.p: Support for the HTTP/2 protocol in the Networking stack and integrated with IIS 10.0, allowing IIS 10.0 websites to automatically serve HTTP/2 requests for supported configurations. This allows numerous enhancements over HTTP/1.1 such as more efficient reuse of connections and decreased latency, improving load times for web pages.
Ability to run and manage IIS 10.0 in Nano Server. See IIS on Nano Serveriis-on-nano-server.md.
Support for Wildcard Host Headers, enabling administrators to set up a web server for a domain and then have the web server serve requests for any subdomain.
A new PowerShell module IISAdministration for managing IIS.
